QString Message

Detailed Description

A class for Exceptions thrown by Pomotux Graphical User Interface. It is a simple class made on the specific purpose to save messages to be prompt to the user when something unexpected happens. It automatically converts the string passed to a string compatible with qt (i.e. QString obj type) ready to be used inside a QWidget
e.g. on how to use it: 
 include "pomotuxexception.hpp"
 include <QMessageBox>

 int main(void)
 {
    try
    {
           if(condition_statement) throw PomotuxException("Message");
           ...
           statements
           ...
       }catch(PomotuxException e){
           QMessageBox msgBox;
           msgBox.setText(e.getMessage());
           msgBox.exec();
       }
  }
